summary: I love seeing the tags on my Michael Sheen gifsets... They go from "soft babey cutie i love him pls protect him" to "i want him...
body:
I love seeing the tags on my Michael Sheen gifsets… They go from “soft babey cutie i love him pls protect him” to “i want him to raw me” there’s no in between…

I’ve even seen tags like “i know I’m a lesbian but the thing I would let him do to me”

I’m glad we all love him in different levels lol

reblog.comment:
I love seeing the tags on my Michael Sheen gifsets… They go from “soft babey cutie i love him pls protect him” to “i want him to raw me” there’s no in between…

I’ve even seen tags like “i know I’m a lesbian but the thing I would let him do to me”

I’m glad we all love him in different levels lol

I’m glad we all love him in different levels lol

tags: I loved it so much I remember that
summary: Listen I know it's not cool to brag that you new something before it was cool, but a while back I watched celebrity bake off...
body: Listen I know it’s not cool to brag that you new something before it was cool, but a while back I watched celebrity bake off because of David Mitchell and there was Michael Sheen and he wore SUSPENDERS AND DUNGEREES toGethEr and made really weird Welsh short bread and without having watched any of his movies I just straight out fell in love with him. What I mean is if you have not watched it, do it immediately, it’s a blessing for everyone. Look at him.

reblog.comment: Listen I know it’s not cool to brag that you new something before it was cool, but a while back I watched celebrity bake off because of David Mitchell and there was Michael Sheen and he wore SUSPENDERS AND DUNGEREES toGethEr and made really weird Welsh short bread and without having watched any of his movies I just straight out fell in love with him. What I mean is if you have not watched it, do it immediately, it’s a blessing for everyone. Look at him.

What I mean is if you have not watched it, do it immediately, it’s a blessing for everyone. Look at him.
trail.content: Listen I know it’s not cool to brag that you new something before it was cool, but a while back I watched celebrity bake off because of David Mitchell and there was Michael Sheen and he wore SUSPENDERS AND DUNGEREES toGethEr and made really weird Welsh short bread and without having watched any of his movies I just straight out fell in love with him. What I mean is if you have not watched it, do it immediately, it’s a blessing for everyone. Look at him.

summary: ok so having a big post-Good Omens mood and I am in need of more Michael Sheen in my media (also going through a huge second...

ok so having a big post-Good Omens mood and I am in need of more Michael Sheen in my media (also going through a huge second David Tennant phase so binged half of Broadchurch in 2 days 🤷)

anyone’s got recs on what I should watch next? already saw Bright Young Things and Wilde is up next :)

summary: It looks like it's Neil Gaiman's time to shine!
title: It looks like it's Neil Gaiman's time to shine!
body:
It looks like it’s Neil Gaiman’s time to shine!

For fans of fantasy, “Neil Gaiman” is a certitude. The way he writes is mesmerizing, funny, witty, and overall incredibly beautiful, that keeps you hooked up for chapters and chapters. I know, I’m not here to talk about books, so why am I here talking about one of the greatest writers of our generations? Well, my dear readers, because Neil Gaiman is finally having his well-deserved time…in tv!

View On WordPress

summary: Like the playlist starts with the two greatest Crowley x Aziraphale songs of all time: "I Wanna Be Your Dog" and "Red Right...
body:
If you guys didn’t know Michael Sheen curated a Good Omens playlist on Spotify and gave the gays everything they wanted.

Like the playlist starts with the two greatest Crowley x Aziraphale songs of all time: “I Wanna Be Your Dog” and “Red Right Hand”.

Thank you for my life Mister Sheen.

reblog.comment:

Like the playlist starts with the two greatest Crowley x Aziraphale songs of all time: “I Wanna Be Your Dog” and “Red Right Hand”.

Thank you for my life Mister Sheen.
